body:
Beautiful. Exquisite. Favorited.
To you vanil fags do not understand the beauty of NTR. Go and be more C U L T U R E D.
To appreciate the greatness of NTR, follow these rules:

1. Always be a narcissist. Tell your-degenerate-self: It's absolutely FINE when it doesn't happens to you. Watching people getting cucked on each others is the prime. Getting YOURSELF be cucked is not.

2. Embrace the Japanese NTR Culture. Yeah. It's a thing and either join and be one of them. Or don't.

3. Don't like it? THEN GET THE FUCK OUT! Basically, don't be a dicc. Going online and ashame yourself by talking shit about NTR is just... childish. It makes you looks like a dumb 12yo horny monke who doesn't like NTR but read it anyway because... idk, wtf is wrong with your brain? You read a thing you FUCKING KNEW that you don't like then telling people it is shit? Spermatozoon replaced your brain cells, dickface? 

Anyway, vanil fags. Go and get an appointment with a doc before comment anything here.
I Don't Get angry when I Read NTR doujins but this is bullshit.... I'd already be a murderer if I Saw the author of this crap
Chapter 5 better have good eending, this garbage rn is triggering the fuck out of me, like what sick fuck even faps to this shit?
